verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah! <S%H3050><s%> I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3050><s%> with my whole heart, <S%H3824><s%> in the council <S%H5475><s%> of the upright, <S%H3477><s%> and in the congregation. <S%H5712><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s works <S%H4639><s%> are great, <S%H1419><s%> pondered <S%H1875><s%> by all those who delight in them. <S%H2656><s%>
His work <S%H6467><s%> is honor <S%H1935><s%> and majesty. <S%H1926><s%> His righteousness <S%H6666><s%> endures <S%H5975><s%> forever. <S%H5703><s%>
He has caused <S%H6213><s%> his wonderful works <S%H6381><s%> to be remembered. <S%H2143><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is gracious <S%H2587><s%> and merciful. <S%H7349><s%>
He has given <S%H5414><s%> food <S%H2964><s%> to those who fear <S%H3373><s%> him. <S%H5769><s%> He always remembers <S%H2142><s%> his covenant. <S%H1285><s%>
He has shown <S%H5046><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> the power <S%H3581><s%> of his works, <S%H4639><s%> in giving <S%H5414><s%> them the heritage <S%H5159><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
The works <S%H4639><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%> are truth <S%H571><s%> and justice. <S%H4941><s%> All his precepts <S%H6490><s%> are sure. <S%H539><s%>
They are established <S%H5564><s%> forever <S%H5703><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%> They are done <S%H6213><s%> in truth <S%H571><s%> and uprightness. <S%H3477><s%>

He has sent <S%H7971><s%> redemption <S%H6304><s%> to his people. <S%H5971><s%> He has ordained <S%H6680><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%> His name <S%H8034><s%> is holy <S%H6918><s%> and awesome! <S%H3372><s%>

The fear <S%H3374><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of wisdom. <S%H2451><s%> All those who do <S%H6213><s%> his work have a good <S%H2896><s%> understanding. <S%H7922><s%> His praise <S%H8416><s%> endures <S%H5975><s%> forever! <S%H5703><s%>
